subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The decision not to renew Bruce Arena’s contract rekindled speculation that the U.S. Soccer Federation would pursue Jürgen Klinsmann, who recently resigned as Germany’s coach.
snippet: The decision not to renew Bruce Arena’s contract rekindled speculation that the U.S. Soccer Federation would pursue Jürgen Klinsmann, who recently resigned as Germany’s coach.
